pageName.title: Login
pageName.description: If you want to subscribe to a plan or have already subscribed you can login here. Also if you are a registered provider you can login here.

pageName.title: Become A Provider
pageName.description: You can Become a provider in SubsCrypt platform by connecting a PolkaDot.js wallet and filling a simple form. You are required to stake a minimum amount of token.

pageName.title: Get Test Token
pageName.description: SubsCrypt is blockchain based project so you need tokens to interact with our platform, you can get 10 free tokens here.
